title: How to Pay With Coins on AliExpress

steps.title: Open the AliExpress app and navigate to “Coins.”
steps.content: Open the AliExpress app and navigate to “Coins.” Log into your AliExpress account (or sign up if you don’t already have one), navigate to “Account” at the bottom of the homepage, then tap the “Coins” button. The “Coins” page will show you how many coins you currently have, provide options to earn more, and show you all the items that you can use coins on to earn a discount. [1] X Research source Be aware that AliExpress no longer allows users to redeem coins on a web browser, so you must have the app.

steps.title: Find an eligible product you want to buy.
steps.content: Find an eligible product you want to buy. All of the products you can use coins on will be shown below your daily log-in streak. Scroll through these to find a product you’d like to purchase. You must choose an item from this list in order to use your coins; not all AliExpress products are eligible for a coin discount. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Complete the checkout process to apply your discount.
steps.content: Complete the checkout process to apply your discount. Add your selected item to your cart and proceed to checkout. Fill out all the required shipping and payment info. On the payment page, you’ll see a discount equal to the monetary value of the coins you used. Note that AliExpress typically limits the amount of coins you can use per item, and you cannot pay for an item solely with coins. [3] X Research source If your discount isn’t reflected at checkout, double check that the item you’re purchasing is eligible for coins.

steps.title: Make sure a “coins for coupons” promotion is active.
steps.content: Make sure a “coins for coupons” promotion is active. While you can always use coins to earn discounts on purchases, you cannot always exchange them for coupons. AliExpress will advertise when one of these “coins for coupons” events is happening, so keep an eye out so you can swap your coins for coupons you can use on your AliExpress purchases. [4] X Research source At the time of writing this article, AliExpress has not hosted one of these events in a long time. It is unclear if this promotion is discontinued or if the website will host more events in the future. In past promotions, AliExpress has only given out a certain number of coupons per hour on a first come, first served basis.

steps.title: Determine which type of coupon you’d like to receive.
steps.content: Determine which type of coupon you’d like to receive. Go into “My Account” and navigate to “Coins” to see your current coin balance and any coupons you’ve earned. AliExpress allows you to exchange coins for one of two types of coupons. Select the one you’d like to use and complete any additional on-screen instructions to exchange your coins for the coupon. You must have a sufficient balance of coins in order to exchange them for coupons. Here are the two types of coupons you can choose from: [5] X Research source AliExpress coupons have an exchange rate of 100 coins for a $1 coupon and can be applied to all stores and orders within the AliExpress platform. These coupons typically expire after 7 days. Store coupons have an exchange rate of 50 coins for a $1 coupon and can only be used for the specific store the coupon is from. The terms and conditions of these coupons depend on the seller.

steps.title: Apply the coupon to your purchase.
steps.content: Apply the coupon to your purchase. Add the items you want to buy to your cart, then proceed to checkout and fill out the required payment and shipping information. Often, AliExpress will automatically apply your coupon at checkout, but if it doesn’t, enter your coupon code into the promotion box. Hit apply, make sure the discount has been taken off, then finish checking out. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Complete your daily check-in.
steps.content: Complete your daily check-in. AliExpress allows you to earn a certain number of coins each day just for hitting the check-in button. Log into your account, navigate to “Coins,” and click the check-in button at the top of the page. You’ll earn anywhere from 20 to 70 coins each day, with the possibility of earning even more if you keep up your check-in streak. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Play games on AliExpress.
steps.content: Play games on AliExpress. In addition to being a shopping platform, AliExpress also hosts several in-app games in which you can earn additional coins. Some allow you to gamble your existing coins to earn even more. The available games vary from day to day, so check in often to see all the different options. [8] X Research source Some games allow you to spend coins in exchange for coupons or discounts, as well. Be aware that each game costs a certain number of coins to play, and when you gamble your coins, there is a chance you won’t earn them back.

steps.title: Earn coins by completing different tasks.
steps.content: Earn coins by completing different tasks. After doing your daily check-in, AliExpress allows you to keep earning coins by completing different tasks within the app. Click “Earn more coins” on the “Coins” page to see all the tasks you can do that day. These are usually simple things like searching a keyword, exploring sponsored items, and browsing limited offers, and they typically pay anywhere from 1 to 10 coins each. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Look out for special promotions.
steps.content: Look out for special promotions. Sometimes, AliExpress hosts special events and promotions that allow you to earn coins. [10] X Research source While these promotions vary, you’ll generally be asked to complete specific actions, like adding special items to your cart. You don’t actually have to purchase the item to earn the coins—this is just AliExpress’s way of tempting you to hit the purchase button.

steps.title: Coins are a virtual currency used to earn discounts on AliExpress.
steps.content: Coins are a virtual currency used to earn discounts on AliExpress. AliExpress allows users to earn free coins they can use for discounts on purchases or, sometimes, exchange for coupons. These coins are not legal tender and can only be used on AliExpress. They have no monetary value in real life. [11] X Research source

steps.title: AliExpress coins are typically worth 1 US cent.
steps.content: AliExpress coins are typically worth 1 US cent. While AliExpress coins have no monetary value outside of AliExpress, each coin is the equivalent of 1 cent, meaning you’ll need to earn 100 coins to get $1 off of your purchase. When you view your earnings on the “Coins” page, AliExpress should tell you the monetary value of your coins in your country’s currency. [12] X Research source If you're exchanging coins for a store coupon, they're worth 2 cents each (50 coins = $1 coupon).

steps.title: Coins keep customers coming back to the app.
steps.content: Coins keep customers coming back to the app. Many people don’t browse shopping apps unless they intend to buy something, but as a business, it’s important for AliExpress to encourage their users to open and spend time on the app. Because users can earn coins daily, they’re more likely to check the app each day, which may encourage them to buy things more frequently.

steps.title: It encourages on-the-spot purchases.
steps.content: It encourages on-the-spot purchases. The more coins a customer has, the bigger discount they’ll get on purchases. Because coins can only be used on certain items and for a limited amount of time, AliExpress users are more likely to purchase something they wouldn’t normally buy because they don’t want to miss out on a good deal.

steps.title: Giving out coins increases the app’s reach.
steps.content: Giving out coins increases the app’s reach. AliExpress users earn coins by completing different tasks in the app. Some of these tasks involve sending referral links to invite others to join the platform. In addition to earning coins, users can receive up to $5 worth of coupons when someone uses their referral link. This helps AliExpress gain and keep loyal users. [13] X Research source

steps.title: It keeps customers entertained.
steps.content: It keeps customers entertained. Being able to collect free coins each day provides a form of entertainment for AliExpress customers. Users can also play games to earn more coins. AliExpress gives users a fun way to earn discounts, which keeps them coming back for more. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Earning coins makes shopping feel more rewarding.
steps.content: Earning coins makes shopping feel more rewarding. Because coins can be exchanged for discounts or purchases, customers often feel proud of the money they saved while shopping on AliExpress. Even if they still spend a lot of money, they’ll feel like they saved because of all the discounts AliExpress offers in exchange for coins.

steps.title: Earning coins may be worth it if you use AliExpress frequently.
steps.content: Earning coins may be worth it if you use AliExpress frequently. Logging into AliExpress daily allows you to quickly earn coins without much effort, so over time, you can save a large amount. However, because coins are only worth one cent, you won’t get much of a discount if you aren’t actively trying to earn them. They also expire, so if you don’t make purchases frequently, you’ll lose your discount. Some people may think it’s worth it to earn coins on AliExpress while others think it’s a waste of time.

steps.title: Do AliExpress coins expire?
steps.content: Do AliExpress coins expire? Yes, all AliExpress coins expire, though the expiration date varies depending on the promotion. When you do things to earn coins, be sure to read the fine print and terms and conditions so you know how long you have to use your coins. [15] X Research source

steps.title: Why can’t I use all my AliExpress coins?
steps.content: Why can’t I use all my AliExpress coins? When AliExpress users first start earning coins, many are under the impression that they can save up all their coins to get items for free. However, this is not the case. AliExpress limits the amount of coins a customer can use per item so that they earn a discount but still have to pay out of pocket. [16] X Research source It’s important to remember that AliExpress is a business, so they’re ultimately looking to make money, not give items away.

steps.title: Does AliExpress refund coins?
steps.content: Does AliExpress refund coins? No, AliExpress does not refund coins. AliExpress coins are not legal tender and cannot be exchanged for cash. In their terms and conditions , AliExpress states that they are not obliged to provide cash, credit, or equivalent for any buyers who forfeit their coins. [17] X Research source
